header_2_font_size_phone=”15px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF”]

GLOBAL LEADING AI AND HUMANOID ROBOTICS COMPANY

UBTECH’s mission is to introduce intelligent robots into every home and business to make everyday life smarter and more convenient.  The robotic innovation and advancements on this page are helping UBTECH reach its company vision goal of being the leading global brand in the AI and Humanoid Robotics industry.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|0px|0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_05.jpg” title_text=”Innovation_05″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_margin=”|0px|||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_padding_phone=”30px|0px|30px|0px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”off|desktop”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”align-self: center;”][et_pb_text content_phone=”

CORE TECHNOLOGY

  • Robotic Servo Motor: Core part of Humanoid Robot functions that allows high precision of accuracy down to the degree.
  • Computer Vision for AI learning on critical components like object detection, facial recognition, target tracking, and human pose estimation.
  • Motion Control that allows gait planning of biped robots, navigation, target tracking, and motion coordination
  • SLAM Technology which brings indoor real time memorization, route planning and obstacle voidance.

” content_last_edited=”off|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px|0px|true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”||||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px|30px|0px|30px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” text_text_color_phone=”#FFFFFF” text_text_color_last_edited=”off|desktop” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_text_shadow_style=”preset5″]

LEADING RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT

UBTECH has made being a leader in AI and Robotics a priority but also continuing the efforts in Research and Development. UBTECH currently holds over 700+ patents in the humanoid robotic industry that apply to the technology inside the robots on the market today. With four major global and educational research partners in Beijing, Tokyo, Sydney and Shenzhen, UBTECH is able to continue the learning and expansion of AI and humanoid robotics.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||flex-wrap: wrap;” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#E02B20″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|tablet” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order: 2;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”30px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

CORE TECHNOLOGY

– Robotic Servo Motor: Core part of Humanoid Robot functions that allows high precision of accuracy down to the degree

– Computer Vision for AI learning on critical components like object detection, facial recognition, target tracking, and human pose estimation.

– Motion Control that allows gait planning of biped robots, navigation, target tracking, and motion coordination

– SLAM Technology which brings indoor real time memorization, route planning and obstacle voidance.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element=”align-self: center;” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order:1;”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_06.jpg” title_text=”Innovation_06″ force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#474747″ custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_padding=”25px||25px||false|true”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_padding=”25px||25px||false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|30px||30px|false|true” animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_padding=”||||true|true” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet”]

PRODUCTS UNDER DEVELOPMENT

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_card_carousel slide_to_show=”1″ autoplay=”off” equal_height=”on” image_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”50px” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.5em” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”12px” button_icon=”%%198%%” button_on_hover=”off” button_alignment=”center” width=”80%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” animation_style=”fade” header_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_font_size_phone=”30px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” button_text_size_tablet=”” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|tablet”][dsm_card_carousel_child image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_12.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_last_edited=”off|phone”]

WALKER CAPABILITES

  • Mobile on Complex Terrains with advanced gait planning
  • Ability to walk up and down stairs
  • Carpet, Hardwood, Marble – Walker is able to achieve precise walking, and stable movement on all types of surfaces

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_14.png” image_as_background=”off” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_last_edited=”off|phone”]

FACIAL, OBJECT & ENVIRONMENT RECOGNITION

  • Walker can detect and recognize corresponding faces, objects, and environments in complex and background heavy situations.
  • Consumers will have the ability to communicate with Walker via voice,text, and facial expressions based on the programmed interaction for your own robot.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_15.png” image_as_background=”off” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_last_edited=”off|phone”]

WALKER IS YOUR SMART HOME HUB

  • Walker has an open, convenient smart home API which allows users to control common household devices and appliances.
  • Having a mobile Smart Home hub improves the home’s intelligence, safety, convenience and comfort.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_01.jpg” image_as_background=”off” button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h1″ header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone” button_text_size_last_edited=”off|phone”]

ADIBOT IN THE CLASSROOM

An easily transportable, UV-C robot that can be where you need it most, when you need it most. With locking omni wheels, long extension cords, daisy chain capability for simultaneous, multiple robot usage, multiple cooling vents and included safety accessories, the ADIBOT-S model is the optimal solution for disinfection needs like school classrooms or common areas.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][/dsm_card_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_09.png” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”24px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”||||true|true” custom_padding_phone=”0px|30px|0px|30px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

YOUR END-TO-END ROBOTICS PARTNER

From assessing your business needs to integrating with your current technology to providing real-time analytics after you’ve deployed, UBTECH is your comprehensive robotics solution partner.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false” animation_style=”zoom”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_11.png” title_text=”Innovation_11″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”35%” max_width_tablet=”35%” max_width_phone=”20%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|tablet” custom_padding=”||||true|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

Research & Ideation

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_04.png” title_text=”Innovation_04″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”35%” max_width_tablet=”35%” max_width_phone=”20%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”||||true|true” custom_padding_phone=”|50px||50px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

Custom Solution Development & Intergration

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”25px||25px||true|false”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ubtechvietnam.com/ENG/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2021/03/Innovation_03.png” title_text=”Innovation_03″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”35%” max_width_tablet=”35%” max_width_phone=”20%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”||||false|true” custom_margin_phone=”||||false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”||||true|true” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|phone”]

Delivery & Maintenance
